situation: I hate my job but I am scared to quit and seek a new career.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hello

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Hello, what would you like to talk about?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am having a lot of anxiety about quitting my current job. It is too stressful but pays well

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: What makes your job stressful for you?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I have to deal with many people in hard financial situations and it is upsetting

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Do you help your clients to make it to a better financial situation?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I do, but often they are not going to get back to what they want. Many people are going to lose their home when safeguards are lifted

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: But you offer them a better future than what they have currently. It may not be what they wanted, but it helps them in the long run.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is true but sometimes I feel like I should put my feelings and health first

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I can understand that.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Is there another job that would pay you close to what you currently make?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Probably not. I was with the same company for a long time and I consistently get a bonus every year

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Is it possible to reframe how you look at your clients' dire financial situations?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I could try. It mostly gets to me at the end of the day

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Some people can't do what you do because they don't have the heart to give someone else bad news. The reality is though, someone needs to fill that role and you do help people

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is also true. Sometimes I wonder if it really is for me though

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I've had to deal with collections before when I was in  bad financial condition. The person on the other line was really helpful though. She was understanding,

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It may not be for you. I think you should think about the pros and cons of keeping your position. It might make things clearer for you.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is true. Maybe I just need to sit down and really think about it

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I wouldn't stay if it really impacts your mental health in a negative way. Still, you may need to zoom out and see the bigger picture: that you provide a needed service and you do it compassionately

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: It really is a big decision

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thank you for the different perspective

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: No doubt, but you know in your heart what is right for you.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is true. Thanks again

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Bye

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It's no problem. I hope you can make a decision about this situation and then be at peace with it

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Ok, take care

seeker_question2: More guidance in conversation or examples

situation: I am depressed staying home due to COVID

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Hi! How are you doing?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am dong good. You?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I am okay thanks but it is a worrying year. Have you been worrying about anything?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I have been staying home since last March due to COVID; getting very depressed.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Ah I hear you, I have been self isolating too. Do you have an online support network?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: What do you mean by support netwrok?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Well, friends you can talk to during this difficult time? I have a lot of friends on facebook and similar that I can talk to.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I have few friends and can talk to but not sure how would they help.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Sometimes it does just make it easier to know that other people are in the same situation as you :)

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: You mean share experiences among the friends?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Yes .. or at least share coping mechanisms perhaps?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Do you have any hobbies that you can occupy yourself with right now?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Yes, I pay musical instruments but do to COVID could not play with the band

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Could you perhaps set up Zoom meetings where you could play together online?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Any idea how would it work? Would there be any delay between the sounds from different instruments?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: No I don't think so :) I think that it is totally live so you could play just as you would if you were together in person.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thanks for the idea. I will give it a try.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I hope it goes well for you. It has been such an awful year, hasn't it?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Yes, it was.. worst I ever seen..

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I wish you all the very best for 2021. I hope that you get to get together with your band again and rock!

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I hope so. As they started the vaccination everything should come back to normal in few months..

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thanks for your time and support.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Yes, all we need to do is be patient! Have a great New Year and thanks for talking.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Bye

situation: General depression made worse by the severity of the pandemic.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hey there

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: How are you?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I AM FINE

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: HOW IS YOUR SIDE ?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am ok, I'm having a hard time dealing with the pandemic though.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Please how may i be of help

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am having a hard time being motivated to do anything.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: okay

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Do you have any suggestions that might help me feel better?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I could see how bad you feel because of that

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: What do you like to do for yourself when you feel bad?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It happens anyway, but not all the time

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: when did it start and what do you think that can cause that

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: It started with the pandemic.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I think it is because we have to stay home to be safe but other people don't listen and more people are dying because of it

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I am like that sometime,  I switch to what I love doing most

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: it good to be safe, pandemic has caused my hoodlums

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: What do you love doing most?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: do you have anything?, that you love doing most

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I like to read

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I love playing soccer game, anytime I am not motivated to work or do anything in office or home, I pick my phone play soccer game. I will laugh, enjoy myself, within 5 minutes , I do gain my morale

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I like that suggestion, thank you

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: that is good, reading is a good hobby

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I should try soccer, that sounds like fun

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It seems you like reading novel

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I do. I like many books

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: very fun, within some minutes , you will be alive back and motivated

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: that is good, you can have soft copies on your phone, open it anytime your are bored

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is a good idea too, I will use my phone to read too

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: it is a nice time chatting with you, if your are okay with that you can end the chat.

situation: friends trying to let me down

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hi

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: hello

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hope you are doing well

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: i'm good, what is troubling you this afternoon?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am not happy with my friends. They were trying to let me down

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: if i get you clearly, you mean your friend disappointed you. how?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Yes. There were a argument between two of my friend while trying to resolve the issue they all started targeting me.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: i have a hard time with my friends too sometimes

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Then what you do at that time

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: i used to give them time to cool off, when they are back to their senses, they will contact me and apologize

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: what causes the argument in the first place ?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I was trying to stop the fight, I just said bit loud , "Stop  all this  nonsense at my place." Then they all started backfiring me.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: oh,jst give them time to reflect on what happen, they will definitely reach out to you, but you also have to make an effort to forgo the situation because they see you raising your voice on them as a sign of command of seniority.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I feel like not talking to them. Without any reason they made such a big mess

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I feel like they are not my true friends. you are right I should give them time to realize their mistakes

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: exactly, that will also gives you the necessary time to know how to react to their forthcoming apologies

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thanks for all your suggestions. I would try to implement on it.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: even if they haven't reach out, that doesn't mean they are not sorry

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: just be patient with them

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thanks! I would not going to talk to them

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: have a wonderful New Year! Bye

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: yes, give them time

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: same to you friend

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: bye

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Hi! Hope you are doing well. How may I help you today?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Good afternoon

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am not good at all

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I seems like you are not feeling well. Am I correct?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Not about feeling well, it is about layoff from my job

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Sorry to hear about it. Due to COVID most of us are trap with certain problem

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: It very serious here in my company firstly it was cut off and now it is layoff

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It's really hard time but we should keep hopes. It will end soon

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Seriously! What I am scare of now is how to secure now job

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I can understand it could be a hard time for you. You try to keep working on your skill. For sure you will find a way

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I pray it works for me, I don't even dream about this at all I don't believed it can happen to me

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I felt the same way when 50% people were laid off from my previous company.  Situation was really stressful all around. I was trying to stay positive and kept working.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I know sometime its hard to believe what happen with us suddenly, At that time we should keep moving and try to find a way.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I don't even know where to star from now I am confused

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Due to COVID Unemployment rate has increased drastically. Most of the people are facing tough time somehow.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I would suggest you to keep trying or working on. Try to explore your strength. I am pretty sure you will get it.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is it my friend! A lot of people are losing their jobs on daily basis, that one a lone is scaring

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I can understand its hard to find a job right now. The situation will not gonna stay the same, we should keep trying.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thanks friend! That is what I was thinking about

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Hope my words will help you stay positive at this tough time which all of us are facing.  The very important thing right now is to stay healthy and safe. Take care

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I will keep on try on till I secure a new job I will not rest

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: You are too good friend! I like your advice.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: It is time to go now. Thanks and good bye.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: hi

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hello

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: how are doing you today, what is troubling you?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am not good at all

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: you are not good, why

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am scaring about layoff from job

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: oh, if i get you clearly, you mean covid-19 impact on your job might soon affect you job

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: You are very correct

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Pandemic is giving us problems

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: yeah, covid-19 is a real bummer but i am sure we will soon get over it and the economy will bounce back

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I pray its over soon, firstly it was paying cut off and now it is layoff

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: i was furloughed my self and now i am working part-time, its not s lot but it is better than nothing

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Seriously! What I  am scare of now is how to secure another job

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: i can feel your pain just by chatting with you

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: i was scared at first too before but now that i gat something i am doing it feels better a bit

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: It is not easy my friend! I don't even dream about this at all I don't believed it is happening

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: yea, it soo surreal, but even though there is a lot lost jobs, there is still a lot of job you can get to keep things balance

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is it my friend! A lot of people are losing their jobs every day by day that one a lone is caring

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: first of all, polish your resume, go online and ask around

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thanks friend! That what I was thinking about

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: You are too good friend, it is time to go thanks

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: from what i have heard and seen, there is job somewhere around, you just have to ask the right person

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thanks for being there for me. we have to go now. Bye

situation: I am depressed staying at home due to COVID.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hi

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: hello there, how are you

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Doing well. How are you?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Good, im ok thanks. What would like to discuss?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am depressed staying home due to COVID.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Oh so sorry to hear. Would you feel a little bit happy when you think when it is over, next year probably?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Absolutely... can't wait until its over !!

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I know right! What would you do once it is over!?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I just want to go to my favorite bar and have a drink...

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Do  you have any other suggestion?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am person who wants to go to work not working from home.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: So, I would be happy to get back to the office and see the other co-workers.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: oh nice! I used to love drinking and partying.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Do you have any suggestion for me?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: My suggestion is to do all you want to do, really. Because I think you know yourself really well.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That's true.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Do you think this will be over soon?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: For a social bees like yourself, staying home would be stressful. I would call all your friends and make some plans for the next year, plans for NYE 2022 etc

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is an excellent suggestion. Thank you.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I am guessing sometime summer next year? We get all  shots and good to go.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I hope so. Do you think we would get the vaccine soon?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: My friend suggested to get a party ticket for 1.5 year later. You're welome!

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Yes, buying something in advance might provide some savings..

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thanks for the suggestion.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Anytime, by the way, I bought a year worth tissues, kitchen papers and toilet tissues. Hoarding is not recommended but it relived my stress.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hi

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Helo, how are you?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Can't seem to shake this overall sadness I feel.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Are you feeling sort of depressed? I am sorry

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Yes I am

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Would you feel happy if you think about after Covid, maybe next year?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am hoping I will. I just have such a hopeless feeling.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: have you been sleeping enough?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Yes, probably too much.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Do you like morning or night?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Probably morning.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Me too. I like morning too. Air feels fresh, although it is little contaminated here. At night time, I feel a little bit anxiety more.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: So I sleep really early. Sleeping feels good anyway? Do you feel ok while you're sleeping?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Yes. I just feel sad during the day and can't make it go away.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I suggest listening to sad yet beautiful music. It sometimes helps me. Do you like classical music?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I haven't really tried it.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: When you are sad, listening to upbeat music may disturb you. Listening to instrumental music maybe good for you.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Ok, I will give that a try.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I just checked YouTube and searched for some music. Good, I hope it will soothe your mind.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thank you, I am willing to try that.

situation: My ex partner is harassing me and will not stop talking to my friends and family.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hello

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Hi! How are you today?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I have been better

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It sounds like you might be upset. Can you tell me what’s going on?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: My ex partner and I broke up a long time ago because they cheated on me. Now they will not stop contacting my friends and family and posting about me on social media

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: That sounds difficult and stressful. What do you do when you see it happening?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I usually just document it and try to not go online for a while. It is hard to ignore

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It sounds like you are avoiding things you enjoy because of their actions. I think documenting it is a good idea! Have you tried reporting them for harassing you?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I have tried but everyone just tells me there is nothing they can do because they don't think it is dangerous or criminal at this point

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: That must be very frustrating. Can you tell me if you’ve tried other things to get them to stop?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I have confronted them in person but it was dramatic to say the least. They basically had a meltdown that they don't want to lose me

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: You tried to do the right thing and they are having a difficult time letting go. The ongoing comments through social media sounds like they are wanting your attention. That can be exhausting for you. In my past, I had to block someone who did something similar to me. If my friends mentioned seeing something from my ex about me, I asked them to keep it to themselves or consider blocking them,too. The people who were closest to me understood what was going on and I realized that people who didn’t know me, didn’t matter. Would you be willing to suggest this to friends or family if it would help to remove the ex from your interactions?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I have encouraged my friends to block them as well, but a new account always pops up. My ex really will not give up.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I see. How long has this been going on and is this a daily occurrence or does it happen at certain times?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: It has been happening for at least 6 months now and it usually happens every weekend

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I can sense your frustration. It must be overwhelming at times and make you dread the weekends. It sounds like it has become a habit for your ex. It might help if you write a letter to them explaining that you are ready to move on and are asking them to do the same. Explain that you are giving them the opportunity to stop harassing you in the following ways [list some of the details you have documented]. Inform them that if they do not stop, you are considering taking it further regarding harassing communications and that this letter serves as your intention to no longer tolerate their actions. Send it via certified mail and keep a copy. This will give them no way to immediately respond and would be the first step of official documentation should they decide to continue.  Do you think that might help?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I think that is an excellent idea! That is a good way to end this once and for all.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I sincerely hope it is a step toward you regaining your control  over how you are able to interact with people. I wish you the best in dealing with this and hope you begin to feel better about it soon, especially entering into a new year!

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Thank you very much!

situation: I can not hang out with my friends due to COVID-19. I miss them a lot but they are high risk.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Hello

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Hi! How can I help you today ?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I am feeling quite sad. I miss hanging out with my friends in person.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It looks like you are missing your friends a a lot.  am I right?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Yes

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I am missing my friends and family too. Due to COVID it's hard for all of us to meet our near and dear. I can totally understand your feeling.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: What do you do to cope?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I do video call. It makes me feel that they are very close to me.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: I do that occasionally but it really is not the same.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I can feel how much you are missing them especially in holidays.  engaging yourself in doing the stuff  which you love can be a good idea

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That is true. Although I may have to find a new hobby that isn't social

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Sadness can lead us to frustration. To avoid that we have to  stay motivated and keep doing something which takes those negative thoughts away

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Do you have any suggestions?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: you can play online games with your friends

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: That sounds fun

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: giving task or challenges to each other,  making funny videos, having competition for cleaning room are few example which can be tried.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Which one do you do personally?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: giving task is my favorite :)

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: What is a good example?

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Telling friend to drink 4 glass of water at once, making bed in 30 seconds, finding particular content on laptop in specific time(30 sec or45 sec)

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: Those seem pretty interesting. Thanks for the advice

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: No problem! Is there anything  else that I can help you with

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: No, I think you did a great job giving advice.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Thanks! Have a wonderful time !

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: You too! Bye

seeker_question1: My partner was a great match
seeker_question2: More direction in the conversation would be helpful to some people.

situation: i had a break up with my partner.in this suitation i was very depressed and i faced lot of stress.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: How are you doing tonight?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: not so happy

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: In what way are you not happy? Can you elaborate?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: i am not happy because of my current breakup with mypartner.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Problems often arise in relationships over misunderstanding each others point of view.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: yeah i accept it there will be misunderstanding we want to get adjust

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: but it must be both side adjusted  ,if not it will result in breakup only.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I completely agree with you. One sided relationships do not work.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: yes it wont work at all

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: What else besides unhappy do you feel about this breakup? Often there are a mix of emotions and looking at all of them is important to see the whole picture. People often report feeling relieved, regretful or other emotions with the feeling of unhappy.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: there is only thing for my depression is my break up i want to over come but i couldnot .

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: What are some things that you enjoyed doing before this relationship?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: i was going out for night pub ,enjoying with  friends

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Reaching out to old friends is a great idea to be able to regain some joy in life.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: but i cannot face them in this sutiation

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: Many books have suggested that we are allowed to disclose what we want in relationships with friends. So if it is not something you wish to talk about with your friends tell them that and they should be willing to accept it. However I do understand if you do not want to reconnect with friends.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: they will accept me but i am not willing to share my negative mood with them.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I understand. What have you tried to overcome your depression?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: i  am trying to overcome but i couldnot

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: I think what I meant are there things that you have done, that while you are doing them, you are not actively feeling depressed? Many people say that going for walks, taking a cooking class, starting a new hobby are ways they have stopped thinking about their depression and found some relief from it.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: yes this seems a good idea

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: i will try  doing this things.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: In the past when I have dealt with depression following a breakup I have taken up a new hobby. I found I liked crochet. I made a blanket that I still have today.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: i will try a new hobby are some other things.

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: That is good to hear. Is there anything else you would like to talk about?

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: nothing else is there

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It was nice talking to you.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: i think this enough for me to overcome my depression.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: thank you for the suggestion

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: It is a good place to start.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: thank you so much

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: it is good talking to you.

dialog.speaker: seeker
dialog.content: bye

dialog.speaker: supporter
dialog.content: bye

supporter_question1: I like to help people with their problems
